name: Meicrackmon_Vicious_Mode
description: Meicrackmon resembles a grown Meicoomon and has a feminine humanoid appearance. Its eyes are red with white " X "-shaped pupils. Its limbs, ears, and scarf-like appendages have grown, and its tail now has a braid, and a purple stinger at its end. Its mane now covers its back, and its front paws now resemble human hands with four fingers and one thumb each and red demonic claws. It also has black armor on its shoulders, thighs, hands, and feet. Its armor has purple neon-like lights, and it also has light purple neon-like lights on its forearms, thighs, and on the cross-shaped cut under its eyes.
